Michelle Keegan has sent her fans into meltdown with a bikini selfie that leaves little to the imagination.

The 32-year-old actress, who recently starred in acclaimed Sky comedy Brassic, posted the snap on Instagram and many of her 4.1 million followers were blown away by the sultry snap.

Taken in black and white, Michelle is seen posing in an ornate mirror, wearing a barely there bikini which accentuated her tiny waist and killer abs.

Standing in high waist bottoms and wearing a black patterned bikini top, Michelle captioned the pic with a ghost emoji.

It was all too much for some of her fans that flooded the comment section with their thoughts on Michelle's selfie.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

One follower wrote: "You look amazing in a bikini, Michelle."

While another was seemingly in ecstasy, writing: "Jesus Christ..... That's it I'm leaving insta can't take it anymore...."

Another was dumbstruck and could only comment: "Wow... Just, wow."

Michelle had previously shared intimate snaps of her holiday in Dubai with husband Mark Wright.

(Image: Instagram)

The pair had jetted off to the Middle East earlier in the month and stayed in the luxurious surrounds of The Palace Hotel, which boasts a 1km private beach as well as eight restaurants and four swimming pools.

Mark and Michelle took the romantic break after Mark had revealed the mental strain of living apart in 2017, when he landed a dream job in America and Michelle was filming Our Girl in South Africa.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Mark was hoping to crack the States, taking on the role as an entertainment reporter on Extra but it took a heavy toll on their marriage, just a couple years after they had tied the knot.

Mark is now back in the UK and has his own show on Heart FM, on which he has vowed not to work away from his wife again.

He admitted that the American role came as he was "chasing money" but now he is happy back in Britain and with the chance to settle back into married life.
